Nightlight/Baaby:

Nightlight was camly sleeping while the baby was full awake an 
uneasy, she liked to see what were that sounds (Magnus and Rodimus's 
voice) but she couldn't freeof mom's hug. She tried to freed so she 
moved and moved... but with out result



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus stood up to shake his friends hand.
> Rodimus Prime: Good luck, Magnus. Although i dont think you need 
it. I know you'll succede.
>  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:Magnus nodded, "Thats why i wanted to talk 
to you. I am going after it, though 
> im torn with my present spark knowing my duty is to protect that 
baby with my 
> life...I can't do the best job I can do without the rest of my 
spark." Magnus 
> stood up. "Wish me luck old friend"
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus Prime: I understand your worry, friend. If your spark 
went with the 
> > ship, the only way I can see getting it back is going after it. 
But we dont know 
> > where it is.
> >  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:Ultra Magnus walked in a sat down. He 
rubbed his 
> > hands togeather and was 
> > obviously nervous. 'I do not know what to do. Half of my spark is 
still 
> > missing, The Tripred ship disappeared without a trace into an 
anamoly in 
> > space. I know that part of my spark is still out there though the 
general is 
> > gone. I am afraid who ever gets a hold of it may try and take 
control of me 
> > again."
> > > 
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :

You try to get

quarters, and to

Ultra Magnus in, 
> > as 
> > > he sits on the couch.

about, old 
> > > friend?
